title: You guys made a skin for basically a permabanned champion
body:
Now there's no excuse for you to not release skins for champions with lower playrates aurelion,illoai,yorick,eve (rework ik), urgot (rework ik) and dozens more.
Get crackin riot

replies.body: I want pool party Illaoi so i can smack people with pool noodles
Illi and Yorick are "supposed" to be getting summer skins.
Most of those are probably pretty close.
